trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the PeerObject class with an auto-generated <xref href="System.Guid"></xref>.
A PeerObject is run-time data, such as a picture, certificate, or a specific description that is associated with a particular application.
The data element of each PeerObject instance must be less than or equal to 16KB in size.
After an instance of PeerObject is constructed it is published with the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure via <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>.

After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties this object may be passed to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration><xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A> methods to enable/disable the publishing of this object for other peers to discover and view.

After registering an object with the collaboration infrastructure the registration information is not persisted in the registry, resulting in different behavior from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> instances.
The object registration is only valid for the lifetime duration of the application which registered the object.
Applications should deregister objects when they are no longer required or prior to application exit.
By default, a PeerObject is automatically deregistered if the instance goes out of scope.

Changing the properties on a PeerObject instance after it has been registered using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> registration methods will not update the registration for the PeerObject instance.
To effectively update the registration of a specific PeerObject instance, the PeerObject must be deleted and registered again with the new information.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> class.

After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the associated scope and data.
The `Id` parameter value utilized by this constructor is auto generated.

After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
The user-defined identifier for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
A data blob that contains information about the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
This parameter is limited a size that is less than or equal to 16K.
Specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is to be registered.
One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
Gets or sets descriptive data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance for a Peer Collaboration application.
Descriptive data (such as text or a small image) associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
Releases all resources utilized by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
Set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to the specified object.
The object to test for equality.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>
instance provided has matching data, else `false`.
The object specified by obj has been disposed.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances are considered equal.
The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to compare.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else `false`.
Compares a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance to test for equality.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else `false`.
The instance specified by other has been disposed.
Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance to populate with data.
The destination for the serialization.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
Signaled when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance changes.
Before this event can be signaled by an object change, subscriptions must be made to the specified remote peer via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
Signaled when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the specified ID is added, updated or removed by a remote peer.
Type of object change specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance associated with this change has been disposed.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance is registered.
PeerScope that specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is registered.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls that are issued as a result of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance change.
Object with an implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface.
This object is used for event handler synchronization.
The calling object has been disposed.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> representing the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
Populates the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
The destination for the serialization.
